review_data.title: Awesome breakfast

review_data.title: Bello fuori, ma
review_data.content: Molto bello da fuori, ben frequentato, musica cool. Peccato che i cocktail non siano così buoni come uno possa pensare

review_data.title: Nice atmosphere but that's about it
review_data.content: Stopped for a drink here no our way to the station after having dinner someplace else. The place looked pretty dimly lit and we thought it'd be perfect for an intimate night out. The music also compliments that atmosphere which is kind of hinting that...More
